description:
Expand your vehicle collection with the Crocodile Pack to receive the seasoned Step 33-64 “Crocodile” truck and its 3 unique add-ons! 

Whatever the job, the versatile Step 33-64 “Crocodile” has seen it before. Hook up one of three custom trailers and get ready to deliver equal amounts of cargo and style.

The Crocodile Pack includes:
• The Step 33-64 “Crocodile” truck
• A Sideboard add-on
• A Maintenance Frame add-on
• A Small Fuel Carrier add-on

The Crocodile Pack is not included in the Year 1 Pass or Year 2 Pass.
name: SnowRunner - Crocodile Pack
